tweets.text:
Wow, episode 2 of The Last of Us just absolutely floored me.

Best episode of television I have seen since the Red Wedding or the Mountain and the Viper.

All time TV.
Just realized pedro pascal has been in 2/3 of the best episodes of television ever
If I had a massive like to use once a year I’ll use it for this one. Even Spider-Man, who’s a teenage nerd, taught us about the link between power and responsibility.
Decentralized leadership is not a thing

For that matter, neither is decentralized decision making.

I actually don’t even know what that means and have yet to get a solid definition.

Does anyone here use Bluesky?

I’ve heard almost nothing about this app, but apparently they have 30M users.

Looks exactly like Twitter as well, unclear of what the value prop is.
